SELECT DATE_FORMAT(srchTime,'%m') as srchWord, count(*) as srchId FROM searchlog WHERE YEAR(srchTime) = YEAR(SYSDATE())
AND userId in (SELECT userId FROM USERDATA WHERE CONVERT ( ((YEAR(SYSDATE())-YEAR(userBirth))/10) , SIGNED INTEGER )=#{years} )
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(srchTime,'%m')
SELECT count(*) FROM searchlog WHERE TO_DAYS(srchTime) = TO_DAYS(SYSDATE())
SELECT * FROM searchlog WHERE userId = #{userId} order by srchId desc
SELECT srchWord FROM searchlog group by srchWord order by COUNT(srchWord) desc
SELECT srchWord FROM searchlog group by srchWord limit 1000

SELECT srchWord FROM searchlog where userId in (SELECT userId FROM USERDATA
WHERE userBirth < #{userBirth} AND userBirth > #{creatTime} ) group by srchWord order by COUNT(srchWord) desc
